body.name: Duracell 2032 Lithium Battery. 6 Count Pack. Child Safety Features. Compatible with Apple AirTag, Key Fob, and other devices. CR2032 Battery Lithium Coin Battery. CR Lithium 3V Cell
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 53 mins
features: COMPATIBLE WITH APPLE AIRTAG: Apple includes a Duracell CR2032 in new AirTag devices. The Duracell CR2032 with bitter coating to help discourage swallowing is the recommended 2032 battery for Apple AirTag.
BITTER TASTE DISCOURAGES SWALLOWING: Duracell Lithium Coin batteries are the only batteries with a non toxic, bitter coating to help discourage swallowing
CHILD SECURE PACKAGING makes Duracell Lithium Coin battery packaging nearly impossible to open without scissors

RELIABLE POWER: The Duracell 2032 3V Lithium Coin battery powers both everyday and essential home devices, including key fobs, remote controls, glucose monitors, thermometers, Apple AirTag and many more
GUARANTEED FOR 10 YEARS IN STORAGE: Holds power up to a decade in storage, so you can be confident these batteries will be ready when you need them
LONG-LASTING BATTERIES DESIGNED FOR DEPENDABILITY: Duracell 2032 Lithium Coin Batteries deliver the long-lasting power and performance you can count on for devices throughout the home or on-the-go

#1 TRUSTED BATTERY BRAND – From storm season to medical needs to the holidays, Duracell is the #1 trusted battery brand; 2032 3V Lithium Coin batteries available in 1-, 2-, 4-, 6-, 8-, and 9- count packs
body.description: Featuring the long-lasting Duracell Lithium Coin 2032 cell batteries with power you can count on! Designed with precision for seamless compatibility for your most important devices like Apple AirTag. Experience unparalleled safety with their unique bitter coating, specially formulated to deter accidental swallowing. With child-resistant packaging, Duracell prioritizes safety and power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should read 3 volts+/-
reviews.reviewText: I made the mistake of checking these with a cheap button cell battery tester. The tester made the battery look bad but it wasn't. Turns out the tester was loading down the battery. Checked it with a voltmeter and it was a steady 3 volts. Good purchase, great price, fast shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Switch to Duracell for Reliable Key Fob Battery Replacement
reviews.reviewText: I initially bought Panasonic batteries for my key fob, the same brand as the original, but they arrived in a small plastic bag and none of them worked. Even after receiving a replacement set, I faced the same issue. This led me to suspect my fob was the problem, but the old, nearly depleted battery still performed better.Eventually, I returned them and opted for Duracell batteries instead. These arrived in official packaging, with each battery easily accessible. To my relief, they worked perfectly as soon as I inserted one into the fob. From now on, I'm sticking with Duracell for reliability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Arrived the day ordered and replaced batteries in my automobile fob. Works like new, easy to install and is good quality. Does the job in a most painless manner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Positive review, No pun intended! Some things you have to buy name brand!
reviews.reviewText: The CR2032 3V Lithium Battery has exceeded my expectations as a reliable power source for various electronic devices! As someone who relies on batteries for everything from small remote controls, to toys, etc., finding a dependable battery is important. Especially when you need a reliable car key Fob!The best of the Duracell CR2032 is its impressive longevity. The battery has a consistently stable voltage output, ensuring a sustained and reliable power supply. This has been particularly noticeable in devices with high energy demands, such as digital child thermometers and small electronic gadgets. The extended lifespan of the Duracell CR2032 translates to fewer battery replacements, saving both time and money in the long run.The compact and slim design of the battery makes it easy to install in various devices without adding unnecessary bulk.Duracell's reputation for manufacturing high-quality batteries is well reflected in the CR2032 model. The brand is synonymous with reliability, and this particular battery lives up to that reputation.Normally I don't buy brand name products, but I've had horrible luck with off brand batteries, and Duracell doesn't disappoint!Seriously Duracell CR2032 3V Lithium Battery is the best choice for those seeking a reliable and long-lasting power source for their electronic devices. Its impressive performance, combined with the well-known Duracell brand, makes it a trustworthy choice for everyone in need of a dependable batteries!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Work GREAT if you can get the out
reviews.reviewText: Duracell quality and reliability - just don't be in a hurry to use one. I don't know if it is a part of the child-proofing, but I have never found any package so difficult to open. After a considerable time struggling to get a battery out, I found that the batteries are sealed between TWO thin plastic layers, in between TWO cardboard layers. It is not apparent that there is a second invisible transparent plastic layer and you can try to tear the carboard all day long and not get the ^%$&^!! package open. I will avoid this particular part in the future - regardless of price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long shelf life, good value
reviews.reviewText: Keeping a pack of these around for the inevitable replacements needed in key fobs, smart tags, remote controls, etc. just makes sense. Tried a generic brand's larger pack and had three dead when need the next one, only a year old. Not had that problem before with Duracell or Energizer. Going with a name brand makes a difference and this is a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Batteries for Parents (or Adult Children)
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these batteries since I needed them and it was not until they arrived that I noticed all the child safety features. First is the packaging. These batteries are sealed up tight. No child will be able to get to them and I venture to guess it will thwart some adults as well. Not me, I am a manly man and no trouble getting the battery out in under 10 minutes time.I then noticed that they have a bitter coating. Not having children myself, I felt it was up to me to test that feature. I popped my newly freed battery into my mouth and within 15 seconds was spitting it back out again. They do not taste pleasant as all. In fact the taste lingers for a long time and should tech any child to never put one back in their mouth again. I feel that I should go ahead and test a few more to make sure that quality control is there.Overall, these batteries are the tops of pop when it comes to child safety. Do you even parent if you don't have them?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need a hacksaw to open the package
reviews.reviewText: Batteries are good. It’s gotten ridiculous trying to open the package my regular scissors didn’t work.
Purchased those batteries for my key fob for both Audi and Nissan. Definitely works better than cheap generic options.
Excellent, excellent prix et Duracell, toujours supérieure à la moyenne.
